snippet.title: Lady Bug - Arcade Gameplay - Universal 1981
snippet.description: Lady Bug is an insect-themed maze chase arcade game produced by Universal Games and released in 1981. Its gameplay is similar to Pac-Man, with the primary addition to the formula being gates that change the layout of the maze when used. The arcade original was relatively obscure, but the game found wider recognition and success as a launch title for the ColecoVision console.
